DESCRIPTION: #ySummoning an #yUndead creates a Minion to aid you in battle. When maximum minions is reached #ySummoning will cause minions of the same type will form a Hoard.
#yUndead, Weak and fragile minions capable of taking blows for you and dealing damage NL HP - #b6 NL Pow - #b4 NL Block - #b4
#yUndead, Infected Arachnids that mindlessly shamble forth their venomous attacks wreck havoc on the living. NL HP - #b25 NL Pow - #b6
Syphon damage restores HP equal to the power of the attack.
Lose X HP as a cost to play this card, then increase X by #b1 this combat.
#ySouls are gathered by slaying non-Minion enemies and stored within your #ySoul #yGem
#ySouls are stored in your #ySoul #yGem while stored they provide #b3 additional Max HP. NL Instead of dying, stored souls are spent to heal 9 HP each, up to half your Max HP.
I need a #rMinion to play this.
#yMinions with #yDefender will take damage instead of you, #yDefender is reduced by #b1 when attacked.
